name: Canadian Forces Snowbirds CT-114 Tutors (x8) Takeoff from Springbank Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
After the Wings Over Springbank Airshow, which took place from July 29-30, most of the performers left right away but the Canadian Forces Snowbirds, or at least, 8 of them, stayed behind for a few days afterward. Here they are departing Calgary's second airport, Springbank, for their next show, which I believe was in Quesnel, British Columbia. Enjoy this comprehensive video of all 8 aircraft starting up, taxiing, and departing!

Thanks for watching!
